Welcome to my website

  • About Me

Who I am

I'm the Head of Cloud Software at PassiveLogic, where I manage a team of software engineers. We design and maintain cloud infrastructure and backend web services to enable fully autonomous building control systems. I have deep experience in software engineering, cloud infrastructure, smart buildings, and building energy efficiency.

Next

Stuff I do

I'm passionate about reducing carbon emissions and open source software. In my free time, I enjoy contributing to projects like GraphQLSwift and Project Haystack when I'm not skiing with my wife, cuddling my dog, or running on trails.
